high_descs: Turn around and go to the wall, toward the baseball bat, then turn left.
Pick up the basketball from the floor, to the right of the box.
Turn around and go toward the bed, then turn right at the desk with the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a basketball in the light.

high_descs: turn around and walk towards the wall behind you, turn left and face the basketball in the corner
pick the basketball up that is in the corner
turn around and walk back towards the bed, stop and face the small table to the right
turn on the lamp that is on the table
anns.task_desc: take a basketball to the table and turn the lamp on

high_descs: Move to the corner of the room to the right of the window.
Pick up the basketball from the floor.
Move to the drawers next to the bed to your left.
Turn on the lamp on the drawers.
anns.task_desc: Inspect the basketball with the lamp on the drawers.
